product_name: Klean Kanteen Stainless-Steel Water Bottle with Sport Cap - 27 fl. oz.
long_description: The rugged Klean Kanteen 27 fl. oz. stainless-steel water bottle with sport cap is a great companion on bike rides, workout sessions and adventures in the mountains. Bottle is made of tough 18/8 food-grade stainless steel that is BPA free and dishwasher safe (hand washing recommended for painted bottles). Sport Cap 3.0 polypropylene cap design has a 25% higher flow rate than the previous version; valve won't chirp or whistle while you sip. Bottle mouth is wide enough to accept ice cubes. Clip a carabiner (sold separately) to the loop on the sport cap and attach the bottle to a backpack or belt loop. Slim design fits neatly in standard sport bottle carriers and most bicycle bottle cages. Klean Kanteen Stainless-Steel Water Bottle with Sport Cap is not 100% leakproof, so keep bottle upright when possible. Please note: Klean Kanteens are single walled and are not intended for use with hot liquids.
short_description: The rugged Klean Kanteen 27 fl. oz. stainless-steel water bottle with sport cap is a great companion on bike rides, workout sessions and adventures in the mountains.
